c1.name: The Seed of Stored Knowledge
c1.descriptionRaw: When the <color=#FFD780FF>Shrine of Maya</color> is unleashed and the Elemental Types of the party members are being tabulated, the count will add 1 to the number of Pyro, Electro, and Hydro characters respectively.
c1.description: When the Shrine of Maya is unleashed and the Elemental Types of the party members are being tabulated, the count will add 1 to the number of Pyro, Electro, and Hydro characters respectively.

c2.name: The Root of All Fullness
c2.descriptionRaw:
Opponents that are marked by <color=#FFD780FF>Seeds of Skandha</color> applied by Nahida herself will be affected by the following effects:
路Burning, Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon Reaction DMG they receive can score CRIT Hits. CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG are fixed at 20% and 100% respectively.
路Within 8s of being affected by Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, DEF is decreased by 30%.
c2.description:
Opponents that are marked by Seeds of Skandha applied by Nahida herself will be affected by the following effects:
路Burning, Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon Reaction DMG they receive can score CRIT Hits. CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG are fixed at 20% and 100% respectively.
路Within 8s of being affected by Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, DEF is decreased by 30%.

c3.name: The Shoot of Conscious Attainment
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>All Schemes to Know</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of All Schemes to Know by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: The Stem of Manifest Inference
c4.descriptionRaw: When 1/2/3/4 (or more) nearby opponents are affected by <color=#FFD780FF>All Schemes to Know</color>'s Seeds of Skandha, Nahida's Elemental Mastery will be increased by 100/120/140/160.
c4.description: When 1/2/3/4 (or more) nearby opponents are affected by All Schemes to Know's Seeds of Skandha, Nahida's Elemental Mastery will be increased by 100/120/140/160.

c5.name: The Leaves of Enlightening Speech
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Illusory Heart</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Illusory Heart by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Fruit of Reason's Culmination
c6.descriptionRaw:
When Nahida hits an opponent affected by <color=#FFD780FF>All Schemes to Know</color>'s Seeds of Skandha with Normal or Charged Attacks after unleashing <color=#FFD780FF>Illusory Heart</color>, she will use Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion on this opponent and all connected opponents, dealing <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro DMG</color> based on 200% of Nahida's ATK and 400% of her Elemental Mastery.
DMG dealt by Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion is considered Elemental Skill DMG and can be triggered once every 0.2s.
This effect can last up to 10s and will be removed after Nahida has unleashed 6 instances of Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion.
c6.description:
When Nahida hits an opponent affected by All Schemes to Know's Seeds of Skandha with Normal or Charged Attacks after unleashing Illusory Heart, she will use Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion on this opponent and all connected opponents, dealing Dendro DMG based on 200% of Nahida's ATK and 400% of her Elemental Mastery.
DMG dealt by Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion is considered Elemental Skill DMG and can be triggered once every 0.2s.
This effect can last up to 10s and will be removed after Nahida has unleashed 6 instances of Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion.
